overallMatch.summary: A concise summary of how your profile aligns with the role, highlighting key strengths and the most critical areas for improvement.
keyStrengths: Strong foundation in core required technologies like [Technology A] and [Technology B].
Relevant project/work experience in [specific area mentioned in JD].
criticalGaps: Lack of explicit mention of [Key Skill C] from the job description.
Experience descriptions could be more results-oriented and quantified.

matchedKeywords.context: Found in skills and work experience.

missingKeywords.recommendation: If you have experience with Agile/Scrum, add it to your summary or a skills subsection.
Mention your experience with consuming or building RESTful APIs in your project descriptions.

keywordAndAtsAnalysis.atsRecommendation: To improve ATS compatibility, integrate the 'missingKeywords' naturally into your work experience bullet points and professional summary.

requiredQualifications.evidence: Clearly stated in the Education section of your resume.

requiredQualifications.comment: Your resume shows 2 years of direct experience. If academic or project work adds to this, consider rephrasing to meet the requirement.

preferredQualifications.comment: No mention of cloud services. If you have any exposure, add it to your skills or projects. If not, this is a known gap.

professionalSummary.suggestion: Rewrite your summary to directly address the job title and top 2-3 requirements from the job description.
professionalSummary.exampleBefore: Software developer with experience in building web applications.
professionalSummary.exampleAfter: Results-driven Software Developer with 3 years of experience specializing in front-end development with React and JavaScript. Seeking to leverage expertise in creating responsive user interfaces to contribute to [Company Name]'s team.

workExperience.bulletPointToImprove: 'Developed features for the company's main application.'
workExperience.suggestion: Quantify the impact of your work. Use the STAR method (Situation, Task, Action, Result).
workExperience.exampleAfter: 'Developed and launched 5 new user-facing features for the main application using React, resulting in a 10% increase in user engagement.'

skillsSection.suggestion: Reorder your skills to prioritize those mentioned most prominently in the job description. Group skills into categories like 'Languages', 'Frameworks & Libraries', 'Tools'.

projectsSection.suggestion: Ensure your project descriptions use the same technical keywords as the job description, especially for technologies like 'Node.js' or 'CSS'.
